title: Spectral diagnostic: covariance kernel over k-space
statement_md: Define a covariance-like kernel $\Sigma_{k,k'} = \mathbf{H}(1-\mathbf{H})\, e^{-|k-k'|/\xi}$ on the $k$-index set and study its spectrum. The leading eigenvalue/mode summarize cross-k correlations.
assumptions_md: Periodic fixture for empirical $\mathbf{H}$; exponential kernel chosen to ensure PSD and finite correlation length $\xi$.
